page.title: 05Family Life at Malpas
page.content:
{ Descriptions by Infant children { My House I live in a{semi-detached house and my next door neighbours are Auntie Kath,Julie and Alison and Uncle John. I have a big{garden}with a{shed. } I have flowers in my garden.I have{ {double-glazed}windows and I have a{ {fence.}My Dad has tools in his shed and my dog sleeps in the shed too.
{ My Mum} My Mum is at home and she{washes}my clothes for me and she makes the dinner and tea and she{hoovers}the carpet and she{irons}the clothes for me.She{makes cakes}and she{dusts}the house and she puts the washing out to dry for us and she puts out my clothes to get dressed in the morning.She does a lot of work.
